attributes.action: Help solve Outstanding car thefts in Solihull
attributes.additional_details:
My catalyst converter was stolen when my car was parked in a parking slot off road,5 days later windscreen was smashed,2 week’s later husband passenger window smashed-its too painful and we can’t afford to be replacing stuff weekly
I am now parking inside the garage, but not every household has garages

In my area all my neighbors experience car theft almost daily from breaking of windows,car wheel thefts to garage door  breakings
attributes.background:
Please fund more lighting for dark car parks.
Please fund for security cameras in hotspot areas-most reported car thefts areas

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about the theft of your car and the distress this has caused you. 

We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Car park lighting and security cameras are the responsibility of car park operators and local councils. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

http://eservices.solihull.gov.uk/mginternet/mgMemberIndex.aspx?bcr=1

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here:

http://www.solihull.gov.uk/Portals/0/CouncillorsAndCommittees/SMBC_Petition_Scheme.pdf
